overview: In her comedy, Maija examines the complexities of what it means to be a mixed-race, multicultural woman through the context of trivial topics like dating, family, and daily observations. Through her witty nature and playful charisma, she is able to dissect heavy subject matter in a way thatâ€™s hilarious, entertaining, and in a dialect that any culture can understand.
title: Maija DiGiorgio: Maija Pinion
